title: Looking for friendly, chilled duo partner.
body:
Looking for friendly and chilled duo partner. Rank doesn't bother me. Banter is fine, just don't abuse the shit out of people. 
Feel free to add me in game on 'Daghoon'.
Thanks

replies.body:
"Banter is fine"

problem with that.

People start to abuse the shit out of you if you try to banter.
